<!-- # Get List of Reports -->

```{r get-list-old-reports}
#print(getwd())
filedir <- file.path("~/R/databrary-analytics/old_weekly_reports")
#print(dir.exists(filedir))
old_report_files <- list.files(filedir, pattern = "*.html")
#print(old_report_files)
```

```{r create-links}
# Create list of links
old_report_files <-  paste0("https://gilmore-lab.github.io/databrary-analytics/old_weekly_reports/", old_report_files)

#Pull out list of report dates



#Create Table

old_report_files %>% 
  knitr::kable(old_report_files, format = "html", col.names = ("Report URL")) %>% 
  kable_styling()
```
